name: Bear Simulator 2016 . Wild Bears Simulation Games For Kids Free
name_original: Bear Simulator 2016 . Wild Bears Simulation Games For Kids Free
description:
The bears are in danger! Play now to save them!

A team of evil hunters want to catch the best bears of the forest!

By seeing the hunters, the bears try to run as fast as they can!

Choose your favorite bear and embark on a crazy race full of obstacles!

This is a really fun simulator. Win the race to give back the happiness to the Bears!

Bear Simulator is an ideal game for all ages, try it!
